1677000.name: Church of Stratum Demo
1677000.description:
It's 2005 and you play as Alex, a wilderness explorer on a trip to the deep forests of america. Though a bad turn of luck you are now trapped inside a dilapidated bunker. You need to find a way out of this place before you end up like the rest of its inhabitants.

A 20 to 50 minute adventure to see what awaits you in the full game.
1677000.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
